section.title: Release 1.11 (TODO: date, 2015)
section.para: TODO: This is primarily a bug fix release. It also has a number of new features:

listitem.para: The Nix language now supports floating point numbers. They are based on regular C++ float and compatible with existing integers and number-related operations. Export and import to and from JSON and XML works, too.
All "chroot"-containing strings got renamed to "sandbox". In particular, some nix options got renamed, but the old names are still accepted as lower-priority aliases.
